text: Paludibacter jiangxiensis is a Gram-negative, obligately anaerobic, mesophilic, non-spore-forming and non-motile bacterium from the genus of Paludibacter which has been isolated from a rice field. Paludibacter jiangxiensis produces propionate and acetate from glucose fermentation and is classified as a saccharolytic fermenter. == References == Category:Bacteroidetes Category:Bacteria described in 2016
title: Paludibacter jiangxiensis
